name: applicationname
author: Idea42, LLC
description: NodeJS Restful API, authenticating with JWT using Sequelize backend

scripts.model:generate: sequelize model:generate --config server/data/config.json.json --migrations-path server/data/migrations --seeders-path server/data/seeders --models-path server/data/models
scripts.migration:generate: sequelize migration:generate --config server/data/config.json --migrations-path server/data/migrations --seeders-path server/data/seeders --models-path server/data/models
scripts.seed:generate: sequelize seed:generate --config server/data/config.json --migrations-path server/data/migrations --seeders-path server/data/seeders --models-path server/data/models
scripts.db:migrate: sequelize db:migrate --config server/data/config.json --migrations-path server/data/migrations --seeders-path server/data/seeders --models-path server/data/models
scripts.db:migrate:undo: sequelize db:migrate:undo --config server/data/config.json --migrations-path server/data/migrations --seeders-path server/data/seeders --models-path server/data/models
scripts.db:create: sequelize db:create --config server/data/config.json --migrations-path server/data/migrations --seeders-path server/data/seeders --models-path server/data/models
scripts.db:seed:all: sequelize db:seed:all --config server/data/config.json --migrations-path server/data/migrations --seeders-path server/data/seeders --models-path server/data/models
scripts.db:seed:undo:all: sequelize db:seed:undo:all --config server/data/config.json --migrations-path server/data/migrations --seeders-path server/data/seeders --models-path server/data/models
